INTRODUCTION: Stick-Build is one of the most interesting and prominent event of metacognition 2k18. This event is basically for designing and building a structure with the raw materials provided. The event calls for teamwork, spontaneity and proper use of raw materials. Event is open for all those who have a keen passion for building.

EVENT STRUCTURE: 
● Sticks, limited amount of adhesive stuff and others will be provided. 
● Only provided materials are allowed to use. 
● Tallest building(according to no.of floors) has to be built in minimum base area within given time. 
● Height of each floor, base area, time of event and other required dimensions will be informed on the spot. 
● Participant’s designed model will be judged according to height of model, no. Of floors, base area and strength.

RULES: 
● Team must consist minimum of 2 participants and maximum of 4. 
● Participants are allowed to use electronic gadgets if required. 
● The decision of judges shall be final and binding. 
● The rules can be changed by the coordinators at any point of time and accordingly you will be informed.
